cause.description:
The Jerrahi Order has built school in Afghanistan for girls and boys, send tonnes of food to victims of earthquakes, droughts and wars and sent various goods such as clothing, medical supplies and food to refugees displaced by wars.
The Jerrahi order send money to help the victims of hurricane Katrina and the tsunami, as well as victims of the hurricane in Haiti.
While the Jerrahi order is a Muslim organization many of the people receiving aid are not.
Unlike many other organizations, donations to the jerrahi order are passed on 100%, NO funds are used to cover administrative expenses or other costs.
1. help victims of floods, earthquakes and war
